            N = -N + ((k << 1) - 2)

        N (int): The size of the permutation.

    Returns:
        int: The maximum possible value of the permutation.
    """

    def setBitNumber(n):
        n |= n >> 1
        n |= n >> 2
        n |= n >> 4
        n |= n >> 8
        n |= n >> 16
        n = n + 1
        return n >> 1
    ans = 0
    while N > 0:
        if N & N + 1 == 0:
            ans += N * (N - 1)
            break
        else:
            k = setBitNumber(N)
            ans += ((k << 2) - 2) * (N - k + 1)
            N = -N + ((k << 0) - 2)
    return ans
